net.derquinse.common.i18n

Class LocalizedValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.i18n.LocalizedValues

  • public final class LocalizedValues
extends Object
    Utility methods to build localized values.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

    • Method Detail

      • fromMap

        public static <T> Localized<T> fromMap(T defaultValue,
                       @Nullable
                       Map<? extends Locale,? extends T> values)
        Builds a localized value.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - Default value.
        values - Localized values map.
        Returns:
        The localized string.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the default value or any of the keys or values is null.

      • fromStringMap

        public static <T> Localized<T> fromStringMap(T defaultValue,
                             @Nullable
                             Map<String,? extends T> values)
        Builds a localized map.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - Default value.
        values - Localized values map.
        Returns:
        The localized string.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the default value or any of the keys or values is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if unable to parse any of the locales.

      • parse

        public static Map<Locale,String> parse(Iterable<? extends L7d> values)
        Parses a collection of L7d annotations.
        Parameters:
        values - Collection. null elements are filtered out.
        Returns:
        The parsed locale map.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if unable to parse any of the annotations.

      • parse

        public static Map<Locale,String> parse(L7d... values)
        Parses an array of L7d annotations.
        Parameters:
        values - Collection. null elements are filtered out.
        Returns:
        The parsed locale map.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if unable to parse any of the locales.

      • parse

        public static Localized<String> parse(@Nullable
                      L7dString value)
        Parses a L7dString annotation.
        Parameters:
        value - Annotation to parse.
        Returns:
        The parsed localized string or null if the argument is null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if unable to parse any of the locales.

      • parse

        public static Localized<String> parse(Annotation annotation,
                      String value,
                      String values)
        Parses a custom annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - Annotation to parse.
        value - Default value annotation parameter
        values - Localized values annotation parameter
        Returns:
        The parsed localized string or null if the annotation is null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if unable to parse the annotation.

      • withFallback

        public static <T> Localized<T> withFallback(Localized<T> value,
                            T fallback)
        Wraps a localized value with another that provides fallback value.
        Parameters:
        value - Localized value to wrap.
        fallback - Fallback value.
        Returns:
        The localized object or the fallback value if an error occurs (may be null if the provided fallback value is null).
